name: Gale Gene TURNER, Administrator of the Estate of Dale Allen Turner, Deceased, and all others similarly situated, Respondents, v. PENNSYLVANIA NATIONAL INSURANCE GROUP, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Turner v. Pennsylvania National Insurance Group

judges: LARSEN, J., files a dissenting statement.
parties: Gale Gene TURNER, Administrator of the Estate of Dale Allen Turner, Deceased, and all others similarly situated, Respondents, v. PENNSYLVANIA NATIONAL INSURANCE GROUP, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of February, 1988, the petition for allowance of appeal is granted. The order of the Superior Court, 357 Pa.Super. 644, 513 A.2d 1082, is reversed. (See Cunningham v. Insurance Company of North America, 515 Pa. 486, 530 A.2d 407 (1987)).
LARSEN, J., files a dissenting statement.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

opinions.text:
LARSEN, Justice,
dissenting.
I dissent from the per curiam reversal of the Superior Court on the basis of my opinion in Cunningham v. Insurance Company of North America, 515 Pa. 486, 530 A.2d 407 (1987).
opinions.author: LARSEN, Justice,

casebody.head_matter:
536 A.2d 1326
Gale Gene TURNER, Administrator of the Estate of Dale Allen Turner, Deceased, and all others similarly situated, Respondents, v. PENNSYLVANIA NATIONAL INSURANCE GROUP, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 4, 1988.
